name: comicvine.lookup_character
description: Lookup a comic book character to get basic info like real name, publisher, image, and summary. Use this for quick character searches.

name.description: The name of the comic character to look up (e.g. 'Spider-Man').

output.name: Spider-Man
output.summary: Peter Parker was bitten by a radioactive spider as a teenager, granting him spider-like powers...

name: comicvine.get_character_details
description: Get detailed character profile with full biography, aliases, origin, appearance history, and complete description. Use this when you need comprehensive character information.

name.description: The name of the comic character to get detailed profile for (e.g. 'Spider-Man').

output.name: Spider-Man
output.summary: Peter Parker was bitten by a radioactive spider as a teenager, granting him spider-like powers...
output.description: Peter Benjamin Parker was born to C.I.A. agents Richard and Mary Parker...
